summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TripStars Task Management System Phase 3 features. All backend APIs (42/42 tests) passed with 100% success rate. New file attachments, productivity tracking, and enhanced dashboards working correctly. Frontend integration successful with role-based access controls functioning properly.

ui_bugs.issue: Some task card clicking issues due to DOM attachment problems during React state updates

passed_tests: Backend: All 42 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Backend: File attachments API (POST, GET, DELETE /api/attachments)
Backend: File validation (type and size limits working)
Backend: Attachment authorization (team members can only access their task files)
Backend: Productivity score calculation (0-100 with proper algorithm)
Backend: completed_at timestamp tracking when task status changes to completed
Frontend: Login functionality for all three user roles
Frontend: Dashboard with productivity score display for team members
Frontend: Reports page accessible by admin and manager only
Frontend: Team overview statistics and individual performance table
Frontend: Role-based navigation (Admin/Manager: Reports, Team Member: My Tasks)
Frontend: Task detail page with Attachments tab
Frontend: Team member correctly restricted from Reports access
Integration: All Phase 3 backend-frontend communication working
Compatibility: Phase 1 & 2 features still working (no breaking changes)
